entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
